ISSUE.TITLE: Incompatible Jackson version in default configuration
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: On a clean `git clone` and `./mvnw clean install`, install fails with exceptions related to a Jackson class missing: ``` Caused by: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/fasterxml/jackson/core/util/JacksonFeature Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.fasterxml.jackson.core.util.JacksonFeature ``` This appears to be due to an outdated Jackson version. Upgrading to `2.14.2` fixes the issue for me: ``` - <jackson-version>2.10.2</jackson-version> + <jackson-version>2.14.0</jackson-version> ```

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #813 from Sharmila-qt1/SPRINT_1_REL Sprint 1 rel

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Upgrade Jackson version used. Apparently 2.10.2 does not include com.fasterxml.jackson.core.util.JacksonFeature, which is required by jackson-databind. This change upgrades jackson to the latest version (2.14.2). Fixes #843.
